name: Vivy
description: Vivy is a discord music bot with a mission to make people happy with songs

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Input here token of the bot. Get this value from https://discord.dev/.

CLIENT_OWNERS.description: Input here list of owner id. Ex: 427560XXXXXXXXXXXX,532766XXXXXXXXXXXX

LAVALINK_ID.description: Input here the identifier for the node. (Leave it empty if you don't know)

LAVALINK_HOST.description: Input here the host for the node. Default: localhost

LAVALINK_PORT.description: #Input here the port for the node. Default: 2333

LAVALINK_PASSWORD.description: Input here the password for the node. Default: youshallnotpass
